did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.unittitle:
Wilmington and Weldon Railroad Transportation Orders,
1862

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Wilmington and Weldon Railroad. Transportation orders, 1862. Accession 26100, Business records collection, The Library of Virginia, Richmond, Virginia.

bioghist.head: Biographical/Historical Information
bioghist.p: During the Civil War Confederate railroads were required to provide transportation of freight, supplies, material, and men for the government. Wilmington and Weldon Railroad was located in North Carolina.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: Requests were issued by the Transportation Office, Confederate States of America, for transportation of indiviuals between Goldsboro and Wilmington, North Carolina.
